name: Against The Wave
description:
This a basic shooter wave game, that`s pretty much it, you can go play a AAA game, go outside, or just relax. Theres nothing else to this game, its probably very bad so don't play it...

Please Don't

Jokes Aside, this game is still in development, stuff might be broken, all the enemys are not in the game yet, I may consider turning the water in the middle of the map into lava, I may add random map generation, and I may add in new weapons, either way. Thanks for playing!
